title: DevOps Pathway (with Docker)
description: Master DevOps practices for AI development: version control with GitHub, containerization with Docker, and cloud deployment on Google Cloud Run.
overview: This pathway introduces students to core DevOps practices for AI development: version control with GitHub, automation with GitHub Actions, containerization with Docker, and deploying simple AI apps on Google Cloud Run. Designed for beginners with no prior experience in GitHub or cloud platforms.
learningOutcomes: Master Git version control and GitHub collaboration
Deploy containerized AI apps to Google Cloud Run
Set up CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions
